item.title: LG 印度公司的银行家收取的费用高于塔塔公司的大型 IPO
item.description: 塔塔资本有限公司（Tata Capital Ltd.）刚刚完成了印度本年度最大的首次公开募股，但事实证明，LG 电子印度有限公司（LG Electronics India Ltd.）的小型交易对银行来说是更有利可图的工作。【原文：Tata Capital Ltd. just completed India’s biggest initial public offering of the year but it turns out that LG Electronics India Ltd.’s smaller deal was the more lucrative job for the banks.】

item.title: 印度央行挤压空头，卢比熊市被击垮
item.description: 印度央行行长桑杰-马尔霍特拉（Sanjay Malhotra）上任 10 个月以来，向货币交易商发出了一个明确的信号：卢比可以更自由地波动，但投机者有可能被压垮。【原文：Ten months into his tenure, India’s central bank head Sanjay Malhotra has sent a clear signal to currency traders: the rupee can move a little more freely, but speculators risk getting crushed.】

item.title: 阿布扎比顶级上市公司打造价值 330 亿美元的投资巨头
item.description: 阿布扎比最大的上市公司正在将三个部门合并，以创建一个庞大的投资巨头，拥有 330 亿美元的资产，横跨 85 个国家的金融、消费和能源领域。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s largest listed company is combining three units to create a sprawling investing behemoth with $33 billion in assets spanning finance, consumer and energy spread across 85 countries.】

item.title: 土耳其股市在议息会议和土耳其卫生防护中心审判前收复年内涨幅
item.description: 土耳其股市接近抹去今年迄今为止的涨幅，原因是政治不确定性影响了市场情绪，投资者也在为下周的一次关键央行会议做准备。【原文：Turkey’s stocks are close to erasing their year-to-date gains as political uncertainty weighs on sentiment and investors brace for a key central bank meeting next week.】

item.title: Indeed 所有者将启动 17 亿美元新股票回购计划
item.description: Recruit Holdings Co. 将回购价值高达 2,500 亿日元（17 亿美元）的自有股票，这是该公司在全球最大招聘门户网站背后进行的一系列回购行动的又一举措。【原文：Recruit Holdings Co. is buying back as much as ¥250 billion ($1.7 billion) worth of its own shares, adding to series of repurchases by the company behind the world’s largest employment portal.】

item.title: 中国家庭储蓄反弹为股市上涨带来风险
item.description: 中国家庭上个月增加了现金持有量，这表明他们开始回避本地股票，而此时市场正面临贸易紧张局势再度升级的挑战。【原文：Chinese households ramped up their cash holdings last month in a sign that they’ve begun shying away from local stocks just as the market is challenged by renewed trade tensions.】

item.title: 特朗普为何将食用油作为中美贸易战的筹码？
item.description: 随着中美紧张局势加剧，食用油可能成为中美贸易战的新战场。美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，美国正在考虑终止从中国的进口，作为对中国拒绝购买美国大豆的 "报复"。【原文：Cooking oil could become a new front in the US-China trade war as tensions between the two countries ratchet up. President Donald Trump said that the US is considering terminating imports from China as “retribution” for its refusal to buy American soybeans.】

item.title: 工厂复苏，英国经济勉强实现小幅增长
item.description: 由于制造业的反弹帮助抵消了占主导地位的服务业在 8 月份的停滞，英国经济在 8 月份恢复了小幅增长。【原文：The UK economy resumed modest growth in August as a rebound in manufacturing helped offset a stagnant month for the dominant services industry.】

item.description: 新加坡主权财富基金在美国法院起诉 Nio Inc.【原文：Singapore’s sovereign wealth fund has sued Nio Inc. in a US court, accusing the Chinese electric vehicle maker and executives of violating securities laws by inflating revenues.】

item.title: 雀巢新任首席执行官加速扭亏为盈，将裁员 16,000 人
item.description: 雀巢公司（Nestlé SA）计划裁员 16,000 人，新任首席执行官菲利普-纳夫拉蒂尔（Philipp Navratil）正努力加速这家瑞士食品制造商的扭亏为盈。【原文：Nestlé SA plans to cut 16,000 jobs as new Chief Executive Officer Philipp Navratil seeks to accelerate a turnaround at the Swiss foodmaker.】

item.title: Ardian 为欧洲基础设施投资筹集创纪录的 200 亿美元资金
item.description: 投资公司 Ardian 为其旗舰基础设施平台筹集了 200 亿美元资金，该平台将主要投资于欧洲，这表明投资者对该地区的青睐程度之深。【原文：Investment firm Ardian has raised $20 billion for its flagship infrastructure platform, which is set to invest predominantly in Europe, demonstrating the depth of investor appetite for the region.】

item.title: 北欧联合银行第三季度贷款收入超出预期，原因是活动强劲
item.description: 由于北欧公司开始寻求投资资金，北欧联合银行（Nordea Bank Abp）的贷款收入超过了分析师的预期。【原文：Nordea Bank Abp’s income from lending topped analyst estimates as Nordic companies began to seek funds for investments.】

item.title: 印度监管机构指控能源交易所期权存在内幕交易
item.description: 印度市场监管机构指控一群有关联的交易员利用未公开的信息，通过股票衍生品对印度能源交易所有限公司（Indian Energy Exchange Ltd.）下注，这标志着该机构在扩大打击内幕交易方面的最新举措。【原文：India’s market regulator alleged a group of connected traders used unpublished information to bet against Indian Energy Exchange Ltd. via equity derivatives, marking its latest move in a widening crackdown on insider trading.】

item.title: 英伟达携手 29 亿美元推动澳大利亚数据中心发展
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）正与澳大利亚初创企业 Firmus Technologies Ltd. 合作，在全国各地建立大规模的可再生能源驱动的人工智能数据中心。【原文：Nvidia Corp. is partnering with Australian startup Firmus Technologies Ltd. to create a massive fleet of renewable energy-powered artificial intelligence data centers across the country.】

item.title: 勒科尔努将在法国议会的不信任投票中获胜
item.description: 法国总理塞巴斯蒂安-勒科努周四宣布计划暂停实施一项有争议的养老金法，以赢得国民议会的支持，似乎将在两项不信任动议中幸存下来。【原文：French premier Sebastien Lecornu appears set to survive two no-confidence motions on Thursday after announcing plans to suspend a contentious pension law in order to win support in the National Assembly.】

item.title: 喷气机大亨因航空旅行量激增而获得 15 亿美元财富
item.description: 去年，波音公司正处于最困难的时期之一，一个相对陌生的飞机买家给了这家制造商一剂急需的解脱针。【原文：When Boeing Co. was navigating one of its most difficult periods last year, a relatively unknown plane buyer gave the manufacturer a much needed shot of relief.】

item.title: 南非酝酿建立入侵植物债券和生物多样性基金
item.description: 一些世界领先的非营利性保护组织正在探索一种与入侵植被清除率挂钩的债券和可持续基金，以保护南非更多的野生区域。【原文：Some of the world’s leading conservation nonprofits are exploring a bond tied to the rate of clearing invasive vegetation and a sustainable fund to protect more of South Africa’s wild areas.】

item.title: 粮食救济使南非人的营养状况达到五年来的最高水平
item.description: 2024 年，能够满足最低营养需求的南非人比例攀升至五年来的新高，因为食品价格走软让家庭松了一口气，尽管贸易战升级和全球成本上升可能会逆转这些成果。【原文：The share of South Africans able to meet their minimum nutritional needs climbed to a five-year high in 2024 as softer food prices offered relief to households, though an escalating trade war and rising global costs may reverse those gains.】

item.title: 铁矿石因新增供应而下跌，中国钢铁需求受关注
item.description: 铁矿石连续第三天下跌，原因是几内亚即将启动的一个大型新项目使价格承压，同时市场在等待中国每周的钢铁数据。【原文：Iron ore fell for a third day as the imminent launch of a major new project in Guinea kept prices under pressure, while the market waited for weekly Chinese steel data.】

item.title: 中国恶劣天气和安全审查导致煤炭价格上涨
item.description: 随着天气变得更加难以预测，以及政府为防止事故和遏制生产过剩而扩大对煤矿的监管，中国的煤炭价格正在逐步走高。【原文：Chinese coal prices are creeping higher as the weather becomes more unpredictable and the government expands its supervision of mines in a bid to prevent accidents and curb overproduction.】

item.title: 人民币期权交易商警惕中美紧张局势持续到 2026 年
item.description: 中美之间不断升级的贸易紧张局势促使人民币交易商为持续到 2026 年初的更大波动做好准备。【原文：Escalating trade tensions between the US and China are spurring yuan traders to prepare for greater volatility lasting into early 2026.】

item.title: 政府与示威者同意会谈，厄瓜多尔抗议活动缓和
item.description: 在丹尼尔-诺沃亚（Daniel Noboa）总统的政府和原住民组织同意于下周开始正式谈判后，厄瓜多尔因政府计划停止柴油补贴而引发的大规模抗议活动即将结束。【原文：Major protests in Ecuador over the government’s plan to stop diesel subsidies are set to end after President Daniel Noboa’s administration and Indigenous organizations agreed to start formal negotiations next week.】

item.title: 日本央行最鹰派成员呼吁在物价风险下加息
item.description: 日本央行董事会成员田村直树（Naoki Tamura）呼吁提高利率，因为他认为通胀上行的风险越来越大，这与他上个月反对保持政策稳定的立场一致。【原文：Bank of Japan Board Member Naoki Tamura called for raising interest rates as he sees increasing upside inflation risks, a view that’s consistent with his stance last month when he dissented from keeping policy steady.】

item.title: 三张图表为陷入困境的日本债券多头带来希望
item.description: 日本政府债券市场的低迷也有一线希望，这让多头对市场稳定抱有希望。【原文：The slump in Japan’s government bond market has a silver lining which is keeping bulls hopeful of market stabilization.】
